bio:
Chelsea Cardinal is a multidisciplinary artist and the founder of Studio of Chelsea Cardinal, a graphic design shop working in the print and digital realms. Grown from a penchant for variety, the studio is flexibly structured and can change size and shape as needed—assembling collaborators or liaising with existing teams case by case.

Before embarking on her independent studio practice in 2015, Chelsea worked at a handful of magazines, honing her taste for visual storytelling and the richness of conversation/play between language and image. Today, the studio is guided by an ethos of observation and inquisitiveness, and playful/unconventional. The work has included branding, books and covers, product development, web, film, and a menagerie of magazines.

Services: Art Direction, Print Design, Editorial Consulting, Brand Identity, Packaging, Product Development, Web

Clients: Random House, Nickelodeon, Players’ Tribune, New York Times, The Economist, Rockefeller Center, Vanity Fair, Bon Appetit, WSJ, GQ, Birthdate Co. Wealthsimple, Shopify.

Contact Studio of Chelsea Cardinal
